alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 22 at 10:51AM PST until January 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees. For the Wind Advisory, northerly winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to around 35 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Banos -Dos Palos and Merced -Madera -Mendota. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 9 AM PST Tuesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
